content:
# Documents to be brought along – checklist – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/documents-to-be-brought-along-check-list/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:23:42

Welcome Point
 > 
Before you arrive
 > 
Documents to be brought along – checklist

Documents to be brought along – checklist

Some issues concerning your stay can already be dealt with before your arrival. We hope the following checklist will help you to prepare your stay in Krakow as well as possible while you are still in your country of origin. 
Click here
 to download it.

BEFORE ARRIVAL – CHECKLIST:

Make sure your passport is valid for the entire duration of your stay in Poland

If you need an entry visa, you should apply for it as early as possible. You should obtain relevant information from the Polish embassy in your country (allow sufficient amount of time before your trip)

Several biometric photos are required (4 colour biometric photos, 35mm x 45mm)

To simplify your life in Krakow, it is useful to take along officially authenticated copies of your most important documents and certificates including all important medical documents, if possible translated into Polish

It is required to take out health insurance – see “Insurance” section

For accommodation, see “Accommodation” section

Please apply for an international driver’s license if you want to drive in Poland

If your family is joining you and you need a place in a kindergarten or school, you will find useful information in the section “Family and childcare”.
